name: Sourcestainable® Organic Chlorella
description: Sourcestainable® Organic Chlorella is grown and processed in a GMP-certified facility in the Yongfeng Forest Agricultural Ecological Park, Dongtai Jiangsu China, along coastal development zone where is environmentally protected away from pollution. Our Chlorella cultivation uses high quality, fossil water found 2,000 feet deep. Fossil water is an ancient body of water that has been undisturbed for millennia. This results in low heavy metals.In addition, Sourcestainable® Organic Chlorella is processed using a proprietary system called Low Temperature Breaking Cell Wall Technology Using ultra low temperature (below 5° F), the cell wall is broken in a fully closed chamber, free from contamination.
